thread.title: BRIEF-LSC Communications To Acquire Print Logistics Component Of RRD's Logistics Business

title: BRIEF-LSC Communications To Acquire Print Logistics Component Of RRD's Logistics Business

organizations.name: brief-lsc communications to acquire print logistics
brief-lsc communications to acquire print logistics component of rrd

text:
May 2, 2018 / 10:44 AM / Updated 11 minutes ago BRIEF-LSC Communications To Acquire Print Logistics Component Of RRD's Logistics Business Reuters Staff 1 Min Read
May 2 (Reuters) - LSC Communications Inc:
* LSC COMMUNICATIONS AND RRD ENTER INTO A DEFINITIVE AGREEMENT FOR LSC TO ACQUIRE THE PRINT LOGISTICS COMPONENT OF RRDâ€™S LOGISTICS BUSINESS
* LSC COMMUNICATIONS INC - THE ACQUISITION IS EXPECTED TO CLOSE IN Q3 2018
